jobDescription: ​Job Duties: Analysing user requirements and defining functional specifications. Designing the applications to attain the look and usability of their current legacy applications. Designing new and existing applications to expand their functions on cross browser and cross platform environment. Write unit test cases for software system testing and validation procedures to verify that software product has met the business requirements. Defect fixing by making appropriate changes in the code design, interact with client to understand requirements, develop standards and assist in project planning. Analysing test results and recommending modifications to the applications to meet project specifications. Develop, integrate and test enterprise software platforms and projects, involved in the complete software development life cycle including analysis, design, development, testing, implementation, debugging and maintenance of software applications. Develop unit test scripts based on business scenarios and cases for manual testing test the application based on the user needs and business requirements. Job Requirement: Required Masters or foreign equivalent in CS, CA, CIS, MIS, Engineering (Any), or any related field + 1 year of experience with the same or similar job duties but given another designation. Proficiency in C++, C#, MS SQL, Firebird, MSTest, Agile methodology required. Must be able to travel/relocate to various client sites throughout the U.S.​​
